caption: Kirsten is prominently featured on network TV in China, as part of the 2020 Universal Studios Beijing Opening Announcement. "We can't wait to share our park with you."
"This is the world coming together... a mix of East and West."   (The Incredible Journey of Creation- Universal Beijing Resort (UBR) China Launch Media)
"We have such a solid team."   (The Incredible Journey of Creation- Universal Beijing Resort (UBR) China Launch Media)
"This entire mountain is our canvas."   (The Incredible Journey of Creation- Universal Beijing Resort (UBR) China Launch Media)
"What I Love."   (The Incredible Journey of Creation- Universal Beijing Resort (UBR) China Launch Media)
